== Create an Excel Spreadsheet
Create a new Java project called _de.vogella.java.excel_ . Create the `de.vogella.java.excel.writer` package and the following class.
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="../examples/WriteExcel.java[] ----
